data.title: Sarah Silverman: Postmortem
data.meta_description: Sarah Silverman is coming to Pearl Theater at Palms!
data.text:
Saturday, September 28, 2024 | 8PM | Pearl Concert Theater

Doors Open 7PM

*No filming or phones are allowed at this event, through Yondr. Guests will be prompted to give their phones to Yondr Representatives who will place the phones into a locked pouch. Guests take the locked pouch with them.

"Postmortem" is a talk show hosted by the irreverent and sharp-witted comedian Sarah Silverman. Known for her bold and often controversial humor, Silverman brings her unique perspective to a wide range of topics in this series. Each episode features in-depth interviews with a variety of guests, including comedians, actors, and public figures, where they discuss current events, personal stories, and societal issues with a mix of humor and sincerity. The showâ€™s format allows Silverman to delve into serious subjects while maintaining her signature comedic edge, providing viewers with thought-provoking and entertaining conversations.
